text: @realDonaldTrump Is this akin to your "happy talk" BS?  We don't need happy talk or self appreciation on your part. Just the truth!! Stop putting out false information about Covid19.  Patting yourself on the back for an hour or more helps NO ONE. Grow up, dude.
